text: Ara tomadera ki hayeche ye tomara allah‌ra pathe kharaca kara na, athaca allah‌ra'i hacche mahakasamandala o prthibira uttaradhikara? Tomadera madhye tara samatulya naya yara se'i bijayera purbe kharaca karechila o yud'dha karechila. Era srenibibhage uccatara tadera theke yara parabartikale kharaca kare o yud'dha kare, ara pratyekake'i allah oyada karechena kalyanera. Kenana tomara ya kara se-sanbandhe allah purna oyakiphahala.
